definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: But farther south Turkey is on virgin turf.
sentences.chinese: 而土耳其的南部偏远地区却是一片蛮荒之地。

sentences.english: The remoteness of Qinghai Province has made it the site of many prison camps.
sentences.chinese: 青海省地区因地处偏远成为监狱营区用地。

sentences.english: Other remote American outposts have closed too.
sentences.chinese: 其他偏远的美军前哨据点也已被关闭。

sentences.english: In search of wild honey, that is, remote mountain areas of Hainan Lingshui.
sentences.chinese: 野生蜂蜜何处寻，就是海南陵水偏远山区。

sentences.english: Before that days, the small remote village had never had high school and kindergarten.
sentences.chinese: 此前，这个偏远小山村还办过初中和幼儿园。

sentences.english: In his spare time he enjoys technical rock and ice climbing in equally far-flung places.
sentences.chinese: 闲暇时，他喜欢到一样偏远的地方攀岩和攀冰。

sentences.english: The quake destroyed mud buildings in many remote villages.
sentences.chinese: 这次地震摧毁了许多偏远乡村的土坯房。

sentences.english: Zapa is a locksmith in a quiet and little town lost somewhere in the province of Buenos Aires.
sentences.chinese: 扎巴是布宜诺斯艾利斯一个偏远小镇上的一名锁匠。

sentences.english: This is largely driven by the remoteness of ANZ locations and the high cost of resources.
sentences.chinese: ANZ的位置偏远和资源成本高是主要的驱动力。

sentences.english: Balaclava is a remote district of Sevastopol.
sentences.chinese: 巴拉克拉瓦是塞瓦斯托波尔的一个偏远的地区。

sentences.english: The outlying villages were formally annexed by the town last year.
sentences.chinese: 那些偏远的村庄于去年正式被并入该镇。

sentences.english: Helena is among the most remote places on earth.
sentences.chinese: 圣赫勒拿到是地球上最偏远的地方之一。

sentences.english: The remote location, strategically located and difficult terrain, Preah Vihear Temple is quite well preserved.
sentences.chinese: 由于地处偏远，地形险要，柏威夏寺保存得相当完好。

sentences.english: The OSP teaches Nepalese children living in inaccessible places.
sentences.chinese: 老师和孩子们住在想象不到的偏远地方。

sentences.english: For ocean views without the motion sickness, set up shop on a remote island.
sentences.chinese: 想要看海又不想晕船，就找个偏远的海岛开家小店吧。

sentences.english: The remoteness of this beautiful temple only makes it more appealing.
sentences.chinese: 这座美丽的庙宇地处偏远，恰恰使它更具吸引力。

definition: no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
outer suburbs/remote outskirts of a city
to be located at/to be situated in
